issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I get the following error when executing euca-describe-instances: {code} [root@h-01 ELB]# euca-describe-instances RESERVATION r-F5B244C5 280787410802 default euca-describe-instances: error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get' [root@h-01 ELB]# euca-describe-instances --debug 2013-04-22 13:07:15,872 DEBUG DescribeInstances parsed arguments: {'userregion': None, 'filters': None, 'InstanceId': [], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_sec_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'url': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2013-04-22 13:07:15,875 INFO DescribeInstances parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeInstances', 'Version': '2013-02-01'} 2013-04-22 13:07:15,875 INFO Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 5) 2013-04-22 13:07:15,877 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.5.1:8773\n/services/Eucalyptus\nAWSAccessKeyId=SQ8WJ0YFYHNDEOAJJD8ML&Action=DescribeInstances&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-04-22T20%3A07%3A15Z&Version=2013-02-01' application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2013-04-22 13:07:15,885 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.0-alpha5-29-g48793af (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-279.22.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0-alpha8-3-ge3aa561 requests/1.1.0 2013-04-22 13:07:15,885 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: AWSAccessKeyId: SQ8WJ0YFYHNDEOAJJD8ML 2013-04-22 13:07:15,885 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Action: DescribeInstances 2013-04-22 13:07:15,885 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Signature: l3U2ovMxvih8xfAvL3CIUvefy/iV+ffbVRPAReB28vc= 2013-04-22 13:07:15,885 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: 13:07:16,081 DEBUG DescribeInstances -- response content -- r-F5B244C5280787410802defaulti-9D9C4223emi-61433A0416running172.27.37.15710.111.101.113NORMAL: -- -- end of response content -- RESERVATION r-F5B244C5 280787410802 default euca-describe-instances: error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get' Traceback (most recent call last): File cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 197, in handle_cli_exception BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 286, in run cmd.print_result(result) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/euca/describeinstances.py", line 195, in print_result self.print_reservation(reservation) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/euca/__init__.py", line 228, in print_reservation self.print_instance(instance) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/euca/__init__.py", line 269, in print_instance instance_line.append(instance.get('iamInstanceProfile', {}).get('arn')) AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get' [root@h-01 ELB]# {code}
fields.summary: euca-describe-instances failed to handle empty instance profile elements

comments.body: This should be taken care of in git. I uploaded a build for testing (euca2ools-3.0.0-0.9.alpha6.20130426git5d03079) here: http://repos.fedorapeople.org/repos/gholms/cloud/
